oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show 1947-12-05
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Multiple recordings of the Hank Thompson Radio Show. Each tape was recorded on December 05, 1947. The recordings were recorded for a play date of December 12, 1947, December 13, 1947, and December 05,1947 respectfully.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:04) Closing "Brazos Valley Rancho" [excerpt] (Hank Thompson) -- (00:25) Opening "Brazos Valley Rancho" [excerpt] (Hank Thompson) -- (00:45) Don't Make Me Sorry (Hank Thompson) -- (03:21)You Broke My Heart in to little Bitty Pieces (Hank Thompson) -- (05:14) Rock in the Ocean [excerpt] (Hank Thompson) -- (05:35) Rock in the Ocean (Hank Thompson) -- (07:07) Today (Hank Thompson) -- (09:02) Headin' Down the Wrong Highway (Hank Thompson) -- (10:49) Closing "Brazos Valley Rancho" [excerpt] (Hank Thompson) -- (11:27) Opening "Brazos Valley Rancho" [excerpt] (Hank Thompson) -- (11:47) My Heart is Full of Misery (Hank Thompson) -- (13:40) Today (Hank Thompson) -- (15:26) Robert Walker radio announcement introducing M. P. Harvey [incomplete] -- (16:15) Humpty Dumpty Heart (Hank Thompson) -- (18:04) My Best to You (Hank Thompson) -- (20:16) Sixteen Tons (Hank Thompson) -- (22:09) Closing "Brazos Valley Rancho" [excerpt] (Hank Thompson)
